data.message: Legacy payload smoke test: PASS. Verified: (1) normalization converts legacy {artifact_id, reason} to canonical {type, id, delta}, (2) apply hits correct artifact with +0.01 default delta, (3) confidence mutation 0.52→0.53 exactly as expected. Backward compatibility confirmed.
